topic.title: Niggers are inferior and i can prove it mathematically
topic.body:
What do we mean when we say inferior?

Humans have evolved. They been evolving in a certain direction - at the start we have some kind of an ancient ancestor ape and at the end we have modern human. When I say that someone is inferior, i mean that he and his ancestors didnt make it as far as the other children. That, on the animal-human spectrum, he is somewhat closer to the animal. 

What i mean when i say race? There is such a thing as a genetic distance. How it is actually calculated is irrelevant in this case, the important part is that the greater the number, the higher the amount of differences in our subjects DNA.  On https://i2.wp.com/www.educationviews.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/race-and-genetic-distance.jpg?resize=688,549 we can clearly see that africans split off rather early on, being considerably further than the first white split. 

So we have a portion of dna that all humans have in common, a part that all people of the same race have in common and a the part that varies from person to person. We can ditch the part all humans have from our consideration, because, well, its pretty irrelevant. We can also drop the part that varies from person to person because we are talking about the context of races here, even though im not saying that it cannot allow any individual to rise about his peers. Aaand we are left with the part that everybody of the same race has in common. 

Now what is the likelihood that all of these 'racial' portions are exactly equal? That none of them is inferior? Not even a little bit?Not very much. They are different, so one of them must be better than the other.

Which one it is though? With most races it would be a difficult to objectively point at any of them as the best one, however one of them very clearly falls behind all the others - niggers. Just think about what it looks like in Africa these days, even after somebody brought them things like modern technology or medicine. South Africa has one of the most fertile lands on the entire planet and somehow they still manage to die of starvation

Or you know, how it looked when the colonists found them. Basically cave people

So yeah here it is. Feel free to point out any inconsistencies or whatever.
